description:
cmd/dist: more build fixes

Flush stdout before writing to stderr, to avoid
reordering output.

Allow amd64 from uname -m (FreeBSD).

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go/

*** Submitted as 830d67171f60 ***

cmd/dist: more build fixes

Flush stdout before writing to stderr, to avoid
reordering output.

Allow amd64 from uname -m (FreeBSD).

TBR=golang-dev
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5629051

subject: code review 5629051: cmd/dist: more build fixes
